abstract: We are told that nobody is watching the World Series between the Cardinals and Rangers, but somehow everyone is talking about it.
snippet: We are told that nobody is watching the World Series between the Cardinals and Rangers, but somehow everyone is talking about it.
lead_paragraph: Mike Tanier will provide Bats with updates on less-than-important developments from the World Series.

headline.main: If Nobody's Watching, Why Is Everyone Talking About It?
